titleStmt.title: A Full and true account of the taking Count Charles John Coningsmark, lately impeached as the principle contriver of the barbarous and bloody murther of Thomas Thinn, Esq; with the manner of his being discover'd on board a Sweeds ship at Gravesend, in the habit of a seaman, on the 19. of this instant February.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Henry E. Huntington Library.
